Package org.jmisb.api.video

Class VideoFileInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jmisb.api.video.VideoIO
      • org.jmisb.api.video.VideoInput
        • org.jmisb.api.video.VideoFileInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, IVideoFileInput, IVideoInput
    public class VideoFileInput
extends VideoInput
implements IVideoFileInput
    Read video/metadata from a file.
